thread.title: Pamela

author: Pamela
title: Pamela
text: We have met wonderful people through Trusted Housesitters. Animal lovers have big hearts and want what's best for others, so it's no surprise that our experiences have been great. We've had house/pet sitters in our home and we have been house/pet sitters ourselves. Trusted Housesitters provides the necessary tools to connect. The reviews and feedback areas make experiences transparent. The user interface could be more intuitive but isn't difficult. Multiple methods in the system provide confidence that you are dealing with reasonably trustworthy people. All around a good experience.
